Package storage

Provides classes for managing data on storage media.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    StorageManager<L,O>
    A StorageManager manages a storage space.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BufferedFileManager
    A BufferedFileManager manages a storage space using the slotted page format and buffering.
    FileManager
    A FileManager manages a storage space using the slotted page format.
    SlottedPage
    A SlottedPage can store objects of possibly different sizes in a byte array.
    SlottedPageFile
    A SlottedPageFile represents a file consisting of SlottedPages.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    StorageManager.InvalidLocationException
    An InvalidLocationException is thrown if an invalid location is used.

Package storage Description

Provides classes for managing data on storage media.
Author:
Jeong-Hyon Hwang (jhh@cs.albany.edu)
